Message.Title: Charles ruined this forum.
Message.Msg: We can all agree on one thing.
John Osborne and Patrick Mitchell ruined this forum.
I wish I could watch my husband grow like that !!
Why bother when Paypal is the only thing propping up eBay's dilapidated stock.

Message.Title: I Am Lisa Hear Me ROAR
Message.Msg: Tired of letting my ex-husband take over this board. Now it's time for a woman's touch. ROTFLMAO Lisa Citrowski

Message.Title: Please Help John Osborne
Message.Msg: My husband John Osborne is very sick. He needs your help for a hip replacement and mental health / addiction treatment. We don't have health insurance and bills are piling up. You can send donations through our accountant Patrick Mitchell.
Hi Patrick, this is Lisa, I think John spoke to you about helping out. God Bless.

Topic.Title: Thanks Pat Mitchell & John Osborne Sullied Gang Fro That Very Profitable $50 Again. Losers.

Message.Msg: Patrick Mitchell, CPA in San Rafael is a very good guy. He's handling the donations for my husband.

Topic.Title: Anyone here buy or sell on ebay?

Message.Msg: Our daughter is doing fine. She's off drugs and has a job at Burger King. John is my primary concern now. He is ailing and needs help.
With this market who knows, however, word on the street is that May's GMV was a dissapointment.
